title: Need 18RP for Star Guardian Lux!
body: Pretty much title. The sale will end today and i just realised yesterday that the skin is on sale, wrote a ticket already but they dont seem to answer :( Can a rioter help me out please? Would be awesome!

replies.body: Wait for the ticket they will ask you for a selfmade picture so you can start doing that already :D. Don't try to Push the Ticket it will only make it Take more time.
Thanks for the assist Timethief!  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can and see if we can work something out.  :D
